mapper.insert: insert into enum_info (id, parent_no, parent_name, sub_no, sub_name, remark, sort_no, inuse, create_username, update_username, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sortNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inuse,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUsername,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.select: select id, parent_no, parent_name, sub_no, sub_name, remark, sort_no, inuse, create_username, update_username, create_time, update_time from enum_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
